problem_info.title: 3434. Maximum Frequency After Subarray Operation
test_examples: Example 1:  Input: nums = [1,2,3,4,5,6], k = 1  Output: 2  Explanation:  After adding -5 to nums[2..5], 1 has a frequency of 2 in [1, 2, -2, -1, 0, 1].
Example 2:  Input: nums = [10,2,3,4,5,5,4,3,2,2], k = 10  Output: 4  Explanation:  After adding 8 to nums[1..9], 10 has a frequency of 4 in [10, 10, 11, 12, 13, 13, 12, 11, 10, 10].
